name: Thomas Vaudan
coverLetter:
Good morning,
I am Thomas from Europe and are in Oregon at the moment. I’m looking for trimming/harvesting job in a cannabis farm for the next 3 month. 

I already work in that branch before. I was used to grow plants for 5 years (indoor-outdoor) and am confortable to trim weed bud in amateur skale. About cloning weed and hydro plantation, I have a few knowledge as well.
I am an hard-workers who can lift enough weight due to my past job. And i’m motivated to learn from you.

I have a tente, so I could sleep anywhere, if I can use toilet and shower. For the timeframe, i’m able to work 10 hours or more per day (6 days a week). And want to know if i will have food included?

Staying available for any further information, and also are free to come at any time. Wish you a nice day.

Thomas
